# Network preparation with QGIS\'s Styling methods

In order to narrow our focus on the possible roads that primary school students would utilize, we filtered the following road network: motorway, motorway_link, primary, primary_link, secondary, secondary_link, tertiary, tertiary_link, residential, trunk and trunk_link.

From the map layout above, we have selected an area which consist of a closed and a merge school along with other schools that is within the area.
